props.avatar: Designates a specific src image to pass to the thumbnail.
props.lines: The amount of visible lines of text before it truncates.
props.sticky: Applies `position: sticky` to the component with `top: 0`. You can find more information on the [MDN documentation for sticky position](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/position).
props.stacked: Forces the banner actions onto a new line. This is not applicable when the banner has `lines="one"`.

slots.actions: The slot used for the action's content such as a [v-btn](/components/buttons).
slots.thumbnail: The slot used for avatars and icon content.
slots.prepend: Slot for icon at beginning of banner.
